sentence: In early trading on Tuesday, shares of General Electric ( GE ) topped the list of the day's best performing Dow Jones Industrial Average components, trading up 1.4%.
Year to date, General Electric has lost about 11.3% of its value.
And the worst performing Dow component thus far on the day is Boeing ( BA ), trading down 0.8%.
Boeing is showing a gain of 22.4% looking at the year to date performance.
Two other components making moves today are Home Depot ( HD ), trading down 0.7%, and Walt Disney ( DIS ), trading up 1.1% on the day.
The views and opinions expressed herein are the views and opinions of the author and do not necessarily reflect those of Nasdaq, Inc.
